Jeremy P. Beasley

I'm a designer and front-end developer currently helping lead the digital product design team at ☕ Starbucks. I previously worked with The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, HP, Intel, Microsoft, and a handful of lesser-known brands and organizations that I care an awful lot about.

I have almost a decade of experience designing and building experiences for people on screens. My hope is that ultimately my work is making people's lives better in some way, shape, or form. I live and work in Seattle, WA with my wife, Amy, and our three amazing kids.
